name: Chile, Chicken, and Cheese Casserole
recipeIngredient: 2 cans condensed cream of chicken soup
2 small cans of chopped green chilies

recipeInstructions.text: Layer Twice: tortillas to cover the bottom of a 9x13 pan, cream of chicken soup, chicken, sour cream, chiles, cheese.
Bake at 325F for 25 minutes. Then turn to 350F until golden brown.
